Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to paratransit services
Summary: Relates to paratransit services, permitting an applicant to submit correspondence from a licensed physician in lieu of an in-person assessment.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to paratransit services
